definition.name: NXfiber

symbol.name: N_spectrum_core
symbol.doc: Length of the spectrum vector (e.g. wavelength or energy) for which the refractive index of the core material is given.

symbol.name: N_spectrum_clad
symbol.doc: Length of the spectrum vector (e.g. wavelength or energy) for which the refractive index of the cladding material is given.

symbol.name: N_spectrum_attenuation
symbol.doc: Length of the spectrum vector (e.g. wavelength or energy) for which the attenuation curve is given.

definition.doc:
An optical fiber, e.g. glass fiber.
Specify the quantities that define the fiber. Fiber optics are described in detail [here](https://www.photonics.com/Article.aspx?AID=25151&PID=4), for example.

field.name: description
field.doc: Descriptive name or brief description of the fiber, e.g. by stating its dimension. The dimension of a fiber can be given as 60/100/200 which refers to a core diameter of 60 micron, a clad diameter of 100 micron, and a coating diameter of 200 micron.

field.name: type
field.doc: Type/mode of the fiber. Modes of fiber transmission are shown in Fig. 5 [here](https://www.photonics.com/Article.aspx?AID=25151&PID=4).

field.name: dispersion
field.doc: Spectrum-dependent (or refractive index-dependent) dispersion of the fiber. Specify in ps/nm*km.

group.name: core
group.doc: Core of the fiber, i.e. the part of the fiber which transmits the light.

field.name: core_material
field.doc: Specify the material of the core of the fiber.

field.name: core_diameter
field.doc: Core diameter of the fiber (e.g. given in micrometer).

field.name: core_index_of_refraction
field.doc: Complex index of refraction of the fiber. Specify at given wavelength (or energy, wavenumber etc.) values.

group.name: cladding
group.doc: Core of the fiber, i.e. the part of the fiber which transmits the light.

field.name: clad_material
field.doc: Specify the material of the core of the fiber.

field.name: clad_diameter
field.doc: Clad diameter of the fiber (e.g. given in micrometer).

field.name: clad_index_of_refraction
field.doc: Complex index of refraction of the fiber. Specify at given wavelength (or energy, wavenumber etc.) values.

field.name: coating_material
field.doc: Specify the material of the coating of the fiber.

field.name: coating_diameter
field.doc: Outer diameter of the fiber (e.g. given in micrometer).

field.name: spectral_range
field.doc: Spectral range for which the fiber is designed. Enter the minimum and maximum values (lower and upper limit) of the wavelength range.

attribute.name: units
attribute.doc: Unit of spectral array (e.g. nanometer or angstrom for wavelength, or electronvolt for energy etc.).

field.name: transfer_rate
field.doc: Transfer rate of the fiber (in GB per second).

field.name: attenuation
field.doc: Wavelength-dependent attenuation of the fiber (specify in dB/km).

field.name: power_loss
field.doc: Power loss of the fiber in percentage.
